definition: A designated location where vehicles regularly stop to pick up or drop off passengers, typically found along a transportation route. It is commonly used to refer to a specific point on a bus, tram, or train route where passengers can embark or disembark.

examples.german: Die nächste Haltestelle ist zwei Straßen weiter.
examples.english: The next bus stop is two streets away.

examples.german: Bitte steigen Sie an der nächsten Haltestelle aus.
examples.english: Please get off at the next bus stop.
The bus stop is currently under renovation.
The bus stop is accessible for people with disabilities.
